channel.title: Pages on localgh0st's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on localgh0st's blog

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Carlos. Welcome to my blog ðŸ‘‹

I’m a person who is deeply passionate about technology, and this blog is a reflection of that. Many times, when I’m building something in my lab or I manage to solve a problem in an interesting way, I think:

“Wouldn’t it be great to share this with the world?”

So, I finally got to work and created this site. Not just to showcase my projects and document things for myself, but also in the hope that someone out there might find it useful.
